error.generic: An error occurred while loading content. Please try again.
error.network: Could not connect to the server. Check your internet connection.
error.offline: No internet connection. Some features may not be available.
error.notFound: The requested content was not found.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.
suggestionsOffline: Some features may continue to work offline
Locally saved data will remain available
suggestionsServer: The server may be temporarily unavailable
Try again in a few moments
If the problem persists, contact support

video.notSupported: Your browser does not support the video element.

section1.title: Welcome
section1.description: This website is dedicated to feminist awareness and is fully accessible for deaf people.
section1.purpose: Our goal is to provide information about feminist history, concepts, and resources in an accessible format with sign language videos.

section2.title: How to navigate?
section2.description: Navigate easily through our website using the following options:
section2.menu: Use the top menu to access the main sections
section2.search: Search for specific content with the search bar
section2.videos: All content includes sign language videos
section2.keyboard: You can navigate completely using the keyboard

section3.title: Multilanguage and Accessibility
section3.languageDescription: Change the language at any time using the selector in the header. We support 6 languages.
section3.accessibilityDescription: This website complies with WCAG 2.2 level AA accessibility standards:

historia.title: History
historia.description: Discover historical facts, people and groups of feminism

violencia.title: Violence
violencia.description: Information about types of violence and warning signs

violence.phone016: Phone number for victims of gender violence
violence.phone017: Helpline for minors about online harassment
violence.noResultsMessage: Try changing the filters or searching with other terms.

recursos.title: Resources
recursos.description: Explore our collection of recommended books, movies and documentaries about feminism

libros.title: Books
libros.description: Discover recommended books about feminism, history and feminist theory

peliculas-series.title: Movies and series
peliculas-series.description: Explore movies and series that address feminist and equality themes

documentales.title: Documentaries
documentales.description: Access documentaries about feminist movements and struggles for equality

recursosAyuda.title: Help Resources
recursosAyuda.description: Find support, testimonials and institutions that can help you

testimonios.title: Testimonials from deaf women
testimonios.description: Learn about the experiences and testimonials of deaf women who share their stories anonymously and respectfully

instituciones.title: Institutions and help applications
instituciones.description: Access institutions, organizations and applications that offer specialized help and support

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Articles and reflections on feminism, equality and women's rights
blog.noArticlesDescription: We will soon publish new articles on feminism and women's rights.
blog.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video element.

comment.submitted: Your comment has been submitted and is pending moderation. Thank you for your participation.
comment.title: Comments
comment.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
comment.name: Name
comment.moderationNotice: Comments are moderated. Your comment will be reviewed before being published.

licenses.title: Content Licenses
licenses.description: The content of this website is available under a Creative Commons license.

about.title: About this Website
about.description: Feminist awareness website accessible for deaf people.

banner.title: Cookie usage
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Some are essential for the site to function. You can accept all, reject non-essential ones, or configure your preferences.
banner.policyLink: Learn more about our cookie policy

modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.intro: You can choose which types of cookies you want to accept. Essential cookies are necessary for the site to function and cannot be disabled.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the website. They include language preferences and user session.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show relevant ads and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

admin.title: Administration Panel

contents.title: Contents
contents.empty: No contents found with the selected filters

admin.noTransitions: This content is already published and cannot change status

error.invalidTransition: Cannot go directly from draft to published. It must be reviewed first.
error.cannotGoBack: Cannot go back from reviewed to draft.
error.cannotChangePublished: Cannot change the status of a published content.
